title: He Caught His Girlfriend Cuddling With Another Man?!
description:
You come home from work to see your girlfriend cuddling with another man on the couch! He's not a stranger, but he is her gay best friend. How do you react? 
This happened to a friend of Bert's, and he's conflicted. How would we feel if we were in this position? We discuss.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
